Pattern.name: Facade
Pattern.Desc: Provide a unified interface to a set of interfaces in a subsystem. Facade defines a higher-level interface that makes the subsystem easier to use.

Node.name: Facade
Node.Desc: Knows which subsystem classes are responsible for a request, and delegates client requests to appropriate subsystem objects.

Node.name: Subsystem Classes
Node.Desc: Implement subsystem functionality, and handle work assigned by the Facade object, but have no knowledge of the facade; that is, they keep no references to it.
